title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: RNDR Falls 5.1% as Nearly All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) was the lone gainer, rising 1.9% from Wednesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3298.7, down 2.2% (-74.23) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

One of 20 assets is trading higher.

Leaders: LTC (+1.9%) and POL (-0.3%).

Laggards: RENDER (-5.1%) and ICP (-5.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is down 2.2% with nearly all assets trading lower and only one asset showing gains.
